data.message:
Honestly...
The best win would be to check out a Detroit Pistons home game with you (Eminem) and getting caught picking our noses, then gaming out to Zelda on the Old School Nintendo while eating some spaghetti and mozzarella cheese sandwiches while drinking some good old Welch's juice.
